text: @WhiteHouse The Trump administration, and every last slimeball who enables it, are no better than the Chinese Communist Party. Lie, cover up, get rid of whistleblowers, pretend Covid-19 cases & deaths don't exist. I could sit here for awhile & keep the list going. #Shitshow
